channel.title: Its time to end these retarded private servers
channel.description:
Runescape Classic is back. They have opened regs for two weeks, meaning anyone willing to buy a membership will be able to play again like it use to be, yes even your old characters with those "awesome" stats. Now doubtful about this? Don't be:
-Why else do you think people turned to Private servers in the first place? Because they wanted another chance to play the REAL thing. Enough with poorly written sources with random shit added to it. You will never see another RSCD or Stork PK come back unless the creators themselves re-release it.
-You've seen the amount of DDoS that's increased over time, because of jealousy or hatred on owners. Jagex won't go down...
-Hosts of the servers vs Jagex: I mean really, Jagex isn't that bad compared to some of the idiots running these servers. No more teenagers with too much free time controlling your game play.
-Training: RSCA will always have the possibility of shutting down, Jagex won't because they will always need more profit, even if it means bringing back the game the day tried so hard to let go. Train your stats, and know they'll be there in x amount of years.
-Botting: With the new servers being released, came a new client, and the need for more bots developed.
Point is; Those who came here wanting to play RSC have another chance, don't waste your time any longer with these shit servers.
PS: Mods PM me before closing/deleting please.

item.title: Its time to end these retarded private servers
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:72, topic:313728”][quote author=Nemesis- link=topic=410233.msg3026597#msg3026597 date=1257975694]

anyone got the deob yet? i wanna make a bot

EDIT:
Was hard to find, here’s the loader anyway:
http://classic2.runescape.com/loader355991348.jar

just decompile and get the real client.

was looking, for it never found it. truely was hard t find

All i found was loader, and strange thing is , i can’t find the real client anywhere. and they implemented some new features to game too:
-Right click report abuse
-Chat censors updated.
-New report abuse button
-Right click offer on trade, and stake(You can still use the old school style of offering cash, also offer x,offer all etc)
-Sell X, Sell All ,Buy X, and other options on shops.
-The messages go up to half of the screen.
-You can now do different color combination’s such as: ‘@red@HI @cya@There @mag@dude!’ in the chat.

That’s all i’ve noticed so far.
[/quote]With the real client you could always do that, it’s fucked up in the RSCD client and I’m assuming it’s because the bad removal of the chat filter.
Also,
http://classic2.runescape.com/rsclassic.jar
http://classic2.runescape.com/rsclassic.js5
http://classic2.runescape.com/unpackclass.pack
http://classic2.runescape.com/loader.jar
http://classic2.runescape.com/loader.cab
http://classic2.runescape.com/rsclassic.pack200[/quote]
I found them ages ago and it was like that on real rsc, if you meant the color combination, u couldn’t use different colors in the chat, I remember it very clearly when I tried to do all colors in 1 text it showed 1 color and rest was @col@.

Read full topic

item.title: Its time to end these retarded private servers
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“The_AFKer, post:57, topic:313728”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=410233.msg3031658#msg3031658 date=1258422285]
I don’t see why an official Jagex release which, thus far, has proved to be quite mediocre would automatically end the private server community.
[/quote]

Because the majority here wanted to play RSC as it was, even if its mediocre, it still beats these emulations (yes, even RSCA). Plus, its not even a private server community anymore, it’s turned to biased advertisements and DDoS wars between server owners. Fun right? Oh and the development is hardly anything, since private developers won’t release unless they in some way benefit.[/quote]
Pretty much sums it up…

Read full topic

item.title: Its time to end these retarded private servers
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:52, topic:313728”]RuneScape Classic is temporarily opened

[quote]Following on from my recent dev blog about our ideas for RuneScape Classic, we are delighted to offer everyone the opportunity to try Classic for themselves! For two weeks starting from today, Classic is open for new sign-ups from RuneScape members only.

If you access Classic during this two-week period (using your normal username and password), you will continue to be able to do so after the two weeks are over. If, however, you do not, you will miss out on the chance to do so, so give it a try.

There are 15 members’ worlds, one of which will be left as being only accessible to those veteran Classic players who have stuck with it all the way through.

You can access RuneScape Classic here.

RuneScape Classic is the predecessor to the current RuneScape game. It was closed to new members over four years ago, but we want for players to be able to try out this important part of our history. We also have potential further plans for Classic (as discussed in this blog), so another reason for this re-opening is to see how many people are interested.

If you have any questions or wish to discuss this, please visit this forum thread.[/quote]
Just dont join RuneScape Classic[/quote]
Temporiraly opened, but still you can play after the 2 weeks.

Just join to RSC.

Read full topic

item.title: Its time to end these retarded private servers
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

RuneScape Classic is temporarily opened

Following on from my recent dev blog about our ideas for RuneScape Classic, we are delighted to offer everyone the opportunity to try Classic for themselves! For two weeks starting from today, Classic is open for new sign-ups from RuneScape members only.

If you access Classic during this two-week period (using your normal username and password), you will continue to be able to do so after the two weeks are over. If, however, you do not, you will miss out on the chance to do so, so give it a try.

There are 15 members’ worlds, one of which will be left as being only accessible to those veteran Classic players who have stuck with it all the way through.

You can access RuneScape Classic here.

RuneScape Classic is the predecessor to the current RuneScape game. It was closed to new members over four years ago, but we want for players to be able to try out this important part of our history. We also have potential further plans for Classic (as discussed in this blog), so another reason for this re-opening is to see how many people are interested.

If you have any questions or wish to discuss this, please visit this forum thread.


Just dont join RuneScape Classic

Read full topic
